data.title: Awesome place to dine and wine
data.text: This place is awesome, right in downtown.  Hard to park and find though.  They have a bar and sometime live band too.  Best brick oven pizza in Roanoke, VA. They have some other dishes too that you can try.

data.title: Lego Build Buffet!
data.text: We had a great visit to The Wayback today.  The kids were participating in a Lego Build and got hungry and we found some great pizza.  Ken (the owner) was absolutely wonderful he made sure we were taken care of and joked around with the kids.  The pizza tasted fantastic (brick oven). I highly suggest anyone come check out their full menu (they don't normally have a buffet).  We will definitely be back on a date night soon!
